short_summary: Request for Proposal: Measurement Canada requests for the fabrication of fifty (50) High Impact Polystyrene Rectangular Hexahedrons. No other materials will be accepted. These are required to conduct performance testing of multi-dimension measuring devices in the shipping industry.
description: The contract is for the fabrication of fifty (50) High Impact Polystyrene Rectangular Hexahedrons. The hexahedrons are required to conduct performance testing of multi-dimension measuring devices in the shipping industry.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Custom High Impact Polystyrene Test Objects

#### Reference Number
WS4265383211-Doc4266783599

#### Solicitation Number
WS4265383211

#### Published Date
16 November 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
14:00 Eastern Time, 19 January 2024

#### Amendment Number
5 (Latest)

#### Expected Contract Start Date
18 December 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
To be determined

#### Description of Request
Measurement Canada is seeking proposals for the fabrication of 50 high-impact polystyrene rectangular hexahedrons to conduct performance testing of multi-dimensional measuring devices in the shipping industry. The test objects should be manufactured from high-impact polystyrene, with no other materials accepted.

#### Specifications
The 50 test objects should be shipped directly to Ottawa, Ontario, via a Designated Delivery Point (DDP).

#### Requirements
All test objects will be subject to inspection at the Designated Delivery Point before being transported to Measurement Canada in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on the quality, accuracy, and compliance of the test objects with Measurement Canada's requirements.

#### Selection Process
The selection process will focus on variations or combinations of the specified methods to determine the best-value proposal.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers who are registered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For more information about this tender, please contact David Murray, Measurement Canada (SPAC/PSPC), at [david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Notice URL
For access to the full tender document, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17847769?extsite=MTc4NDc3NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17847769?extsite=MTc4NDc3NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Important Dates
* Amendment date: 4 January 2024
* Tender closing date: 19 January 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time
* Expected contract start date: 18 December 2023
* Expected contract end date: To be determined

Please note
